  2. Advertisers plan to withdraw from X in record numbers  CNN
  3. Elon Musk's X at risk of advertiser exodus as trust dwindles, survey shows  CBS News
  4. More marketers to pull back on X (Twitter) ad spend than ever before  Kantar
  5. Elon Musk in Deep Trouble as Even More Advertisers Are Planning to Leave Twitter's Toxic Cesspool  Futurism

item.title: Layoffs jump in August while hiring in 2024 is at a historic low, Challenger report shows - CNBC
item.description:
1. Layoffs jump in August while hiring in 2024 is at a historic low, Challenger report shows  CNBC
  2. Mass layoffs hit tech industry: Over 27,000 jobs cut as Intel, Cisco, IBM, and Apple slash workforce  The Economic Times
  3. Layoffs climb at certain types of businesses as job market cools  The Business Journals
  4. Layoffs Spike To 5-Month High In August As Labor Market Softens  Forbes
  5. Planned US layoffs surged in August, recruitment firm Challenger says  Yahoo Finance

item.title: Private sector job growth cools to 99,000 in August, well below estimate: ADP - Fox Business
item.description:
1. Private sector job growth cools to 99,000 in August, well below estimate: ADP  Fox Business
  2. US Companies Add Fewest Number of Jobs Since 2021, ADP Data Show  Bloomberg
  3. Private sector tallies lowest monthly job gain since January 2021  Yahoo Finance
  4. August private payrolls rose by 99,000, smallest gain since 2021 and far below estimates, ADP says  CNBC
  5. ADP National Employment Report: Private Sector Employment Increased by 99,000 Jobs in August; Annual Pay was Up 4.8%  PR Newswire
